list.name: Changes
list.comment:
✨✅️ Add reverse function and unit tests
Implemented a generic function to reverse lists and added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include the new tests.

item.itemvalue: Kotest.BiggestTest: The biggest element in a list (1)

task.summary:
Refactor project structure and update dependencies
Removed the `generalization` module and its related files, including configuration and tests. Added a new `symmetric-properties` module with initial implementations for Encode/Decode and list transformation functions. Updated project properties and configuration files accordingly.

✨📦️✅ Add new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction
This commit introduces three new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction, each with its own build.gradle.kts. It also includes initial Kotlin code and corresponding tests for string manipulation and merging functionality. Additionally, project configuration files have been updated to include these new modules.

✨✅ Add biggest function and corresponding tests
Implemented the biggest function to find the max integer in a list, returning Int.MIN_VALUE for empty lists. Added comprehensive tests for the function using Kotest. Also included tests for string length properties.

✨✅️ Add reverse function and unit tests
Implemented a generic function to reverse lists and added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include the new tests.

MESSAGE.value:
Simplify project structure by removing old config files
Removed obsolete Gradle, IntelliJ, and Kotlin configuration files and .gitignore entries. Added new directories and files representing different modules and projects to streamline the project setup.

Refactor project structure and update dependencies
Removed the `generalization` module and its related files, including configuration and tests. Added a new `symmetric-properties` module with initial implementations for Encode/Decode and list transformation functions. Updated project properties and configuration files accordingly.

✨️✅ Add new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction
This commit introduces three new modules: assumptions, filter, and introduction, each with its own build.gradle.kts. It also includes initial Kotlin code and corresponding tests for string manipulation and merging functionality. Additionally, project configuration files have been updated to include these new modules.

✨✅ Add biggest function and corresponding tests
Implemented the biggest function to find the max integer in a list, returning Int.MIN_VALUE for empty lists. Added comprehensive tests for the function using Kotest. Also included tests for string length properties.

✨✅️ Add reverse function and unit tests
Implemented a generic function to reverse lists and added comprehensive unit tests using Kotest. Updated IntelliJ run configurations to include the new tests.
